definition: small earthenware plate or basin/a monk's alms bowl/Sanskrit paatra
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
the cassock and alms bowl of a Buddhist master passed on to the favorite disciple (Buddhism)/legacy/mantle
see 墨爾本|墨尔本[Mo4 er3 ben3]
mendicant religious order in Catholicism/Franciscan order
to take up sb's mantle/to follow in sb's steps

sentences.english: When it comes to public speaking, there are three major avenues you can take to make good money.
sentences.chinese: 在演说者方面，有三种方法可以使你挣得盆满钵满。

sentences.chinese: 玛勃罗屋顶花园用镜子与花钵来构成。

sentences.english: This Jomon pot is an extremely important pot.

sentences.chinese: 三时，优陀耶婆罗门，以白饭盛满世尊之钵。

sentences.english: She eis second to none among all the graduates.

sentences.english: Soaring prices have made some property developers rich.

sentences.english: These bowls are the only property they are allowed to own.
sentences.chinese: 这些钵，是他们唯一可以拥有的所有物。

sentences.english: We're just two lost souls swimming in a fish bowl, year after year.
sentences.chinese: 我们只是两个失落的灵魂在鱼钵里游泳，年复一年。

sentences.english: Mashiro attacks Shinji but Hachi finally shows up and restrains her with the 5 iron pillars.

definition: pottery container for water, wine etc
